meanings.sent1: The poem was stanzaed, with each section telling a different part of the story.
meanings.sent2: The stanzaed song made it easier to remember the lyrics.
meanings.sent3: The stanzaed recipe made cooking seem like a fun puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a stanzaed garden, each idea neatly separated from the others.
meanings.sent5: The stanzaed format of the book helped the reader follow the plot more clearly.

meanings.sent1: The stanzaed poem had a clear structure that made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The book was stanzaed, making it visually appealing and organized.
meanings.sent3: The stanzaed play was like a series of mini stories within a larger narrative.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was stanzaed, each point neatly presented in its own section.
meanings.sent5: The stanzaed painting had distinct sections that each told a different part of the story.
